page.title: 18PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: The playground at The Chandler Middle School measures approximately 35x45m. There is space for two netball courts, two hopscotch areas and a jumping ladder,which are all marked in playground paint. Most of our playground games involve the use of the marked lines for boundaries or bases.The running and catching games we play are:"Semi's", "Forty-forty in!","Longways","Cages", "Bob down it"and "British Bulldog". Less enegetic games include "Doctor, Doctor","Rotten Egg","Sly fox","Solemn sisters","Sticky glue","Polo","Lobster lobster","Red rover"and"Jelly babies". The girls play a complicated jumping game called"French Elastic".Two people stand about a metre away from each other with a piece of circular elastic arranged round their ankles.A third person stands between them and jumps.
